300 - dimension Glo Ve vectors.from sentence: In all experiments , 300 - dimension Glo Ve vectors are used to initialize E and E when pretraining is not conducted for weight initialization .

used for.from sentence: These vectors are also used for initializing E in the pretraining phase .

randomly sample.from sentence: We randomly sample 20 % of the original training data from the aspectlevel dataset as the development set and only use the remaining 80 % for training .

all experiments.from sentence: For all experiments , the dimension of LSTM hidden vectors is set to 300 , ?

dropout.from sentence: is set to 0.1 , and we use dropout with probability 0.5 on sentence / document representations before the output layer .

RMSProp.from sentence: We use RMSProp as the optimizer with the decay rate set to 0.9 and the base learning rate set to 0.001 .

mini - batch size.from sentence: The mini - batch size is set to 32 .
